nodes.text: The Mon Calamari Shipyards were a large shipyard that orbited the planet Dac.

The Mon Calamari Shipyards were constructed by a joint group of Quarren and Mon Calamari over 4000 years before the Battle of Yavin. Though initially owned by a corporation of the same name, they were occupied by the Galactic Empire, which delegated control of the shipyards to the Loronar Corporation. During the Calamarian Revolt, the Alliance to Restore the Republic and Mon Calamari supporters took over the shipyards and used them to modify a number of Mon Calamari Star Cruisers for battle.
During Darth Wredd's insurgency in 138 ABY, the shipyards were controlled by Darth Luft's pirates until they were attacked by the Galactic Federation Triumvirate.
